Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class CliView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.CliView
public class CliView extends Object
This class contains methods to print and visualize the current state of the game in the CLI

    • CliView

      public CliView()

  • Method Details

    • printGameState

      public static void printGameState(GameState gameState, String currentPlayer)
      Prints a GameState to System.out. Uses ANSI colors. A 50x80 window is recommended
      Parameters:
      gameState - the GameState to print

    • printIslandState

      private static void printIslandState(IslandState islandState, int islandIndex, int MNIndex, boolean isExpert)
      Prints a single line visualizing the state of an island, including its students, owner, noEntry tiles and if Mother Nature is currently there
      Parameters:
      islandState - an Island State, included in a Game State
      islandIndex - the current index of the island (starting from 0)
      MNIndex - the current index of mother nature
      isExpert - whether the game is in expert mode (if it is then noEntries are displayed)

    • printCharacterState

      private static void printCharacterState(CharacterState characterState, int characterIndex)
      Prints a single line visualizing the state of a character, including his name and cost
      Parameters:
      characterState - a character state, included in a GameState}
      characterIndex - the index of this character

    • printDashboardsState

      private static void printDashboardsState(List<PlayerState> players, String currentPlayer, boolean isExpert)
      Prints the dashboards. If the game has 3 or 4 players some dashboards might be printed side-by-side
      Parameters:
      players - a list of player states, included in the game state
      isExpert - whether the game is in expert mode or not

    • printCloudState

      private static void printCloudState(CloudState cloudState, int cloudIndex)
      Prints a single line visualizing the state of a cloud (its students or "empty" if it's empty) ES: Cloud 1 | * * *
      Parameters:
      cloudState - a cloud state, included in a Game State
      cloudIndex - the index of the cloud (starting from 0)

    • printSingleDashboard

      private static void printSingleDashboard(PlayerState player, String currentPlayer, boolean isExpert)
      Prints a single dashboard
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the dashboard to be printed

    • printDoubleDashboard

      private static void printDoubleDashboard(PlayerState player1, PlayerState player2, String currentPlayer, boolean isExpert)
      Prints two dashboards side by side
      Parameters:
      player1 - the owner of the dashboard to be printed on the left
      player2 - the owner of the dashboard to be printed on the right

    • entranceHelper

      private static String entranceHelper(List<Student> entrance, int i)
      Returns a string containing one printable character, which is the i-th student in the given entrance or a string containing just a space char if the given index is out of bound
      Parameters:
      entrance - a list of students
      i - an integer indicating the position of the student to get
      Returns:
      a string containing exactly one printable character

    • getStringFromStudent

      public static String getStringFromStudent(Student student)
      Returns a String from a student. The string is composed by a console color sequence, the student char and the console color reset sequence
      Parameters:
      student - a Student
      Returns:
      a string containing only one printable char

    • getStringFromStudentList

      public static String getStringFromStudentList(List<Student> students)
      Returns a String from a list of students
      Parameters:
      students - a List of students
      Returns:
      a string
